prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon that has an orange body and a cute face.
Imagine a playful Pokemon with brown ears and a red nose, perfect for a starter Pokemon.
Generate a cartoon-style creature with a fiery temperament and a round tail.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire, with vibrant orange and hints of black.
Design a Pokemon with a compact shape, featuring a unique color palette of orange and brown.
Give me a depiction of a friendly fire Pokemon that enjoys exploring grasslands and forests.
Make a fire-type Pokemon that looks adorable and has distinctive ear shapes and a small stature.
